metadata.title: CVE-2024-21193 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: PS).  Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.39 and prior,8.4.2 and prior and  9.0.1 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerabilityallows high privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocolsto compromise MySQL Server.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability canresult in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatablecrash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.9 (Availabilityimpacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-8.0 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
mariadb package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
